title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content: s Leave Act Two - Baldur's Gate is just over the horizon Unmissable Storyline achievement. Fancy Footwork Defeat Gortash in Wyrm's Rock without activating any traps. Missable First Blood Kill Orin while her cultists are performing their ritual chant. Missable Crash Landing In the Wyrmway, wait until the dragon is midflight, then knock it out of the sky - KAPOW. Missable Murder in Baldur's Gate. Coat the streets of Baldur's Gate in blood - become an Unholy Assassin of Bhaal. Embrace your Urge Bec
